discussion_comments.commented_code:
@@ -222,6 +242,10 @@ def perform_scheduled_scan_task(self, tenant_id: str, provider_id: str):
         generate_outputs.si(
             scan_id=str(scan_instance.id), provider_id=provider_id, tenant_id=tenant_id
         ),
+        check_integrations_task.s(
discussion_comments.comment_body: It needs to be .s because we require the output of the previous task. We use .si when we don’t need anything from the previous task (within a chain)
